scripts.restart: docker compose build && docker compose up
scripts.migrate:make: docker compose exec dockercompose npx knex migrate:make --migrations-directory ./src/db/migrations -x ts
scripts.migrate:up: docker compose exec dockercompose npx knex migrate:up --knexfile ./src/db/knexfile.ts
scripts.migrate:down: docker compose exec dockercompose npx knex migrate:down --knexfile ./src/db/knexfile.ts
